meta.processing_time_standard: High wait times: 10-14 months for interviews, 4-7 months for waivers.
meta.max_stay: Up to 6 months per visit (determined at port of entry)
meta.passport_validity: 6 months beyond intended period of stay

documents.title: Original Passport
documents.description: Valid for at least 6 months beyond intended stay. Must have at least one blank page.

documents.title: DS-160 Confirmation Page
documents.description: Printout of the confirmation page from the CEAC portal after submitting Form DS-160.

documents.title: Appointment Confirmation
documents.description: Printout of the appointment letter for both the VAC (biometrics) and Consular Interview.

documents.title: MRV Fee Receipt
documents.description: Proof of payment of the $185 visa application fee.

documents.title: Proof of Funds
documents.description: Bank statements (last 6 months), payslips, or tax returns (ITR) to prove ability to cover trip expenses.

documents.title: Employment/Ties Proof
documents.description: Letter from employer detailing position, salary, and approved leave. If business owner: Company registration and tax docs.

documents.title: Invitation Letter (Optional)
documents.description: If visiting family/friends: Letter of invitation and copy of their status in the US (Passport/Green Card).

steps_flow.title: Complete DS-160
steps_flow.description: Fill out the Nonimmigrant Visa Application (DS-160) online. Keep the barcode page safe.

steps_flow.title: Pay Visa Fee
steps_flow.description: Create a profile on the official US Visa Scheduling site and pay the $185 MRV fee.

steps_flow.title: Schedule Appointments
steps_flow.description: Book two appointments: one for Biometrics (VAC) and one for the Consular Interview.

steps_flow.title: Attend Biometrics (VAC)
steps_flow.description: Go to the Visa Application Center to provide fingerprints and photo.

steps_flow.title: Consular Interview
steps_flow.description: Attend the interview at the US Embassy/Consulate. Carry all original documents.
